description:
style of c.1725-1750; walnut stock, brass furniture and silver inlay; inlay work includes winged serpent above trigger on both sides and floral motif above trigger on top of neck; walnut patch box is relief carved with leaves; brass on top of butt is engraved with a female figure; "J.N. Valentin", engraved on top of barrel; rod not measured because it would not come out easily. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
marks: \"J.N. Valentin\", engraved on top of barrel
title: Germanic Flintlock Rifle (In-line)
